alert.note: Alert for Marion; Pike; Ralls (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 11:01AM CDT until June 29 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Calhoun County in southwestern Illinois... Pike County in west central Illinois... Ralls County in northeastern Missouri... Southeastern Marion County in northeastern Missouri... Pike County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 1145 AM CDT. * At 1100 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Fall Creek to near New London to near Perry, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hannibal, Bowling Green, Pittsfield, Vandalia, Louisiana, Barry, New London, Pleasant Hill, Perry, Atlas, Eolia, Center, Clarksville, Frankford, Pike, Curryville, Spencerburg, Tarrants, Belleview, and Independence. This includes Interstate 72 between exits 4 and 35. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
